timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText: Any reason why you didn't use this: StringUtils.rightPad()
timeline.author: balhar-jakub

timeline.bodyText: I would delete it as there is the same functionality in the StringUtils in Apache Commons among others.
timeline.author: balhar-jakub
